articles.header: What does my monthly broadband cost include?
articles.text: Your monthly broadband cost now includes line rental, so it is one fixed cost that remains the same for your 24 month contract.
It’s our set of extra features that come with your plan which includes SuperSafe anti-virus protection, Phone Privacy Features & voicemail service and much more

articles.header: How do I know my price won't go up?
articles.text: All our broadband plans come with a Fixed Price Guarantee. The price when you sign up is the same price you’ll be paying right through your contract throughout your minimum contract term. If you are not within a minimum contract term, your prices are subject to change.

articles.header: Can I add TV at any stage?
articles.text: Yes. You can add TalkTalk TV to your plan at any time in My Account. TalkTalk TV lets you pick & mix your perfect TV package with a range of flexible TV boosts, all with just a 1 month commitment so you’re never tied into lengthly contracts.

articles.header: How fast will my broadband be?
articles.text: We’ll give you the fastest broadband your line can handle, and you’ll see a speed estimate for your address before you sign up with us. Your speed will be affected by your distance from the telephone exchange, the performance of your PC and the wiring in your home.
As much as you like. Our broadband plans give you unlimited downloads for your music, film and TV.
Yes, but if you make calls without adding a Calls Boost, you’ll be charged our standard rates. There is a £100 call usage limit, but we let you know when you’re close to it.

articles.header: What if I don't want to make any calls at all?
articles.text: You have the option to block all outgoing calls on your line to help further control your spend. You can do this by calling our customer services department. You will always be able to make calls to emergency services (999, 112).

articles.header: Can I use this package without a phone?
articles.text: Yes, you can just our service for the internet, there’s no need to plug in a phone.

articles.header: Why do you ask for my telephone number?
articles.text: We need it to check the phone line at your address and it helps us estimate the broadband speed you can get. If our checks show there isn’t a working phone line at your address, you may need a new one. We can arrange an engineer visit on a date to suit you.

articles.header: Why do you charge line rental for broadband?
articles.text: All home broadband requires an active phone line, whether or not you use it for phone services. We can provide a new line if necessary.

articles.header: Can I keep my phone number?
articles.text: Yes, most customers can keep their existing number. But if we find we can’t transfer it, we’ll let you know.

articles.header: What happens if I'm switching from another broadband provider?
articles.text: Switching to TalkTalk is simple. Just choose the broadband plan you want and we do the rest. Your current service will be cancelled as soon as your TalkTalk service starts so there’ll be no gap in service, no overlap and you won’t be double-charged. Your previous provider will credit you for any unused line rental.

TV Boosts are collections of TV channels you can add to your broadband & TV package for extra live and on-demand entertainment. You only pay for a month at a time, so there’s no long-term commitment and they’re easy to add through your TV box.

articles.header: When will my TalkTalk TV box be delivered?
articles.text: You should receive your TV Box within 2 working days of your broadband go live date. You’ll receive an SMS that it’s on its way and an update on delivery day with a 1-hour window.

articles.header: Will I need to sign for the TV box on delivery?
articles.text: Yes, a signature is required. If you are unavailable the driver will try to deliver to a neighbour or leave a card for you with pick-up and redelivery options.

articles.header: What if my router is in a different room to my TV?
articles.text:
To minimise cabling you can add a pair of Powerline Adaptors when you place your order.

These turn a mains socket into a network connection and extend your broadband connection.
